mapper.select: select count(email) from user where email=#{email}
select password from user where email=#{email}
mapper.insert: insert into address (email, name, phone, postcode, province, city, county, detail) values(#{email},#{name},#{phone},#{postcode},#{province},#{city},#{county},#{detail})
mapper.update: update user set password=#{password} where email=#{email};
mapper.insert: insert into article (head, content, cover) VALUES (#{head},#{content},#{cover});
